# [[red]] [[flag]] or [[banner]]
#: {{zh-x|屆 時 該 區 附近 將 會 懸掛 紅旗 指示，各界人士 切{cit3}勿 進入 區 內，以免 發生{sang1} 危險。|At that time, those places will have red flags nearby erected to act as a signal, everybody please do not enter into the zone, lest any danger happen.|C-LIT}}

====Usage notes====
* In ancient times, red banners were used by military units. In Hong Kong, red flags are erected when there are dangers nearby.
